name: Jump & Gun
description:
Avoid and Kill the Red Enemies.

Up arrow: Jump

Down arrow: Shoot

If the Red Bullet touch you, you die.
If when you kill a Enemy, you get a point.

This game was made for Low Effort Jam 5 from itch.io
https://itch.io/jam/low-effort-jam-5
All the sprites ar formed by one shape and all the sounds are sounds from the gallery.
